ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank Dirk Eick, Georg Kochs, and Francesco Gonzales-Scarano for providing antisera.

Work in the F.W. laboratory is funded by Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG; German Research Foundation) Projektnummer 197785619 (SFB 1021), as well as by SFB 593, SPP 1596, and individual grant We2616/2-3.
